> How many times did you have to sit there pressing
right-click for that?

*stops to think*

Over 30 minutes.  Or was it over an hour?  On 3rd thought, it might 
have been over an hour and half.  It's hard to tell because my fingers 
got tired adjusting the stats and had to take a pretty good break.

> This is DPH we're talking about. I think he's so obsessed with 
Gladiator that even that won't stop him.

I'll have the lot of you know that when I restored my computer, the 
last thing I put back on there was . . Gladiator.

And if you guys think I'm a bit excessive about Gladiator, then I've 
done a good job of keeping my other big online activity hidden.
